thread.title: St.Etienne Player Shits The Bed When He Finds Out He's Facing Zlatan Ibrahimovic
thread.title_full: St.Etienne Player Shits The Bed When He Finds Out He's Facing Zlatan Ibrahimovic

title: St.Etienne Player Shits The Bed When He Finds Out He's Facing Zlatan Ibrahimovic
text:
St.Etienne Player Shits The Bed When He Finds Out He's Facing Zlatan Ibrahimovic Wed Feb 22 2017 11:45:34   11:45:34 GMT+0000 (GMT) TheSPORTbible football 
Having been on the receiving end of 17 goals in 14 games from Zlatan Ibrahimovic, the last thing St.Etienne want is another round with the mercurial Swede, yet according to early team news reports, that's exactly what 'Les Verts' are in for, tonight. 
Despite holding a 3-0 advantage from the first leg of their Europa League round of 16 tie with the Ligue Un outfit, Manchester United will include their top goal scorer in tonight's squad, and St.Etienne's Romain Hamouma couldn't be less thrilled about the prospect of facing the Swede. 
Ibrahimovic bagged his first United hat-trick during last week's first leg at Old Trafford, putting Jose Mourinho's in a commanding position. It was expected that Mourinho would rest several key players tonight ahead of Sunday's EFL Cup final against Southampton, yet the Portuguese coach obviously has other ideas, much to Hamouma's chagrin. 
"Ibrahimovic isn't playing, right? He is? Shit! How many goals has he scored against us? 17, right? What do you want me to say?" Ibrahimovic continued his ridiculous run of form against St.Etienne, last week. Image: PA 
It would appear that you've said everything you need to, Romain. 
Hamouma did start the previous game at Old Trafford, so perhaps he's still waking up in cold sweats, enduring nightmares of Zlatan's scrappiest ever hat-trick. When you hear you're facing Zlatan, again. Image: PA 
Even if Ibrahimovic is kept on the bench, St.Etienne could well have their hands full with either Marcus Rashford or Anthony Martial leading the line for United.
